means.word_mean: 逆境;厄运;(经济方面的)窘境

sentences.en: Adversity comes with instruction in its hand.
sentences.cn: 逆境给人以教益。

sentences.en: Adversity is a good discipline.
sentences.cn: 逆境是最好的磨炼。

sentences.en: Adversity is a good schoolmaster.
sentences.cn: 逆境为良师。

sentences.en: Adversity leads to prosperity.
sentences.cn: 逆境通向成功。

sentences.en: Adversity makes strange bedfellows.
sentences.cn: 逆境使陌生人成为同床之友。

sentences.en: Adversity reveals virtue.
sentences.cn: 岁寒知松柏,逆境显美德。

sentences.en: As fire tries gold,so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.cn: 烈火炼真金,逆境见美德。

sentences.en: A well-prepared mind hopes in adversity and fears in prosperity.
sentences.cn: 有充分准备的人,在逆境中充满希望,在顺境中不忘担忧。

sentences.en: She was confident that she would ultimately triumph over adversity.
sentences.cn: 她相信自己最终能战胜逆境。

sentences.en: They triumphed over adversity.
sentences.cn: 他们战胜了逆境。

sentences.en: When faced with adversity she was never tempted to give up.
sentences.cn: 面对逆境她从未想过放弃。

sentences.en: Mr. Huang has been a good friend to me in adversity or in prosperity.
sentences.cn: 不管我处于逆境还是顺境, 黄先生一直是我的好友。

sentences.en: Sweet are the uses of adversity.
sentences.cn: 因祸得福。

sentences.en: The fire is the test of gold;adversity of strong man.
sentences.cn: 烈火试真金,困苦练壮士。

sentences.en: The friendship sealed in adversity is the sincerest.
sentences.cn: 患难中结成的友谊最真挚。

sentences.en: The true features of a man is shown in adversity;the strength of a horse is tested on a muddy road.
sentences.cn: 患难识人,泥泞知马。

sentences.en: We will never forget the friendship sealed in adversity.
sentences.cn: 患难之交永不忘。

sentences.en: Prosperity makes friends,and adversity tries them.
sentences.cn: 富贵交友易,患难显真情。

sentences.en: Share joys and sorrows with your comrades,and support one another in adversity.
sentences.cn: 同甘共苦,患难相扶。

sentences.en: Adversity shows what men really are and separates the sheep from the goats.
sentences.cn: 患难可以看清人的本质,分清好人还是坏人。

sentences.en: In time of adversity,those who do not desert you are real friends.
sentences.cn: 在患难中不弃你而去的人才是真正的朋友。

sentences.en: A friend is best found in adversity.
sentences.cn: 患难见真情。

sentences.en: Adversity acquaints men with strange bedfellows.
sentences.cn: 难中不择友,饥不择食。

sentences.en: Adversity makes a man wise,not rich.
sentences.cn: 困难和不幸不能使人富有,却能使人聪明。

sentences.en: Their friendship was forged by sharing adversity.
sentences.cn: 他们的友谊是由于共患难而结成的。

sentences.en: He met with adversities abroad.
sentences.cn: 他在国外遭遇种种不幸。

sentences.en: The accident precipitated them into the depth of adversity.
sentences.cn: 意外事故使他们一下子陷入了苦海。
